name: Remind.
description:
Remind is a story-based 2D game.

You play as Althea, a 30-year-old woman who tries to get by as a housewife diagnosed with a disease that causes her to slowly forget everything around her.

Remind sets place in a house consisting of a mother, father, son and daughter. Playing as the mother throughout her house going  through puzzles and psychological experiences. While learning more about the mother and her family this will give the player another way of thinking.
